original: Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānittha so sotāyatanaṁ parijānissatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhāyatanam parijānittha so sotāyatanam parijānissati iti no

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam parijānissati saḥ cakkha āyatanam parijānittha ati no

original: Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānittha so sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhāyatanam na parijānittha so sotāyatanam na parijānissati iti

original: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānittha, no ca sotāyatanaṁ na
analyzed: ye maggam paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanam na parijānittha no ca sotāyatanam na

original: parijānissanti. Aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanañca
analyzed: parijānissanti agga magga samaṅgī ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te cakkha āyatanañca
na parijānittha sotāyatanam ca na parijānissanti

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam na parijānissati saḥ cakkhu āyatanam na parijānittha ati

original: Arahā sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissati, no ca cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānittha. Aggamaggasamaṅgī
analyzed: arahā sotāyatanam na parijānissati no ca cakkhāyatanam na parijānittha agga magga samaṅgī

original: ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te sotāyatanañca na parijānissanti cakkhāyatanañca na parijānittha.
analyzed: ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te sotāyatanam ca na parijānissanti cakkhāyatanam ca na parijānittha
